data.title: Jennifer Lopez reveals how Ben Affleck proposed: 'The most romantic thing I could've ever imagined'
data.meta_description: The latest Speed Read,/speed-reads,,speed-reads, breaking news, comment, reviews and features from the experts at The Week
data.text:
Jennifer Lopez is ready to dish.

The "Jenny from the Block" singer has shared details of how Ben Affleck proposed to her for the second time. On a Saturday night, "while at my favorite place on Earth (in the bubble bath), my beautiful love got on one knee and proposed," she wrote in the latest edition of her newsletter, "On the JLo."

"I was taken totally off guard and just looked in his eyes smiling and crying at the same time trying hard to get my head around the fact that after 20 years this was happening all over again, I was quite literally speechless and he said, 'Is that a yes?'" she wrote. "I said 'YES of course that's a YES.'"

Lopez continued that she was "smiling so big and tears were coming down my face, feeling so incredibly happy and whole," adding the proposal was "nothing fancy at all, but it was the most romantic thing I could've ever imagined â€¦ just a quiet Saturday night at home, two people promising to always be there for each other."

Last Friday, Lopez confirmed she and Affleck were engaged again, which came about a year after they rekindled their romance. They first dated in the early 2000s and got engaged in 2002, but they called things off before the wedding. Since then, Lopez married Marc Anthony, getting divorced in 2014, while Affleck married Jennifer Garner, getting divorced in 2018. Both have children from their previous marriages.
